title: Titanic dataset
description: The titanic dataset used to predict survival of passengers given information such as age, sex, sibling counts, etc.

id.name: PassengerId
id.description: A unique identifier for each passenger in the dataset.

target.name: Survived
target.description: A binary variable indicating whether or not the passenger survived (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

predictors.name: Pclass
predictors.description: A categorical variable indicating the passenger class (1 = 1st, 2 = 2nd, 3 = 3rd).

predictors.name: Sex
predictors.description: A categorical variable indicating the passenger's gender (male or female).

predictors.name: Age
predictors.description: A numeric variable indicating the passenger's age in years.

predictors.name: SibSp
predictors.description: A numeric variable indicating the number of siblings/spouses aboard the Titanic.

predictors.name: Parch
predictors.description: A numeric variable indicating the number of parents/children aboard the Titanic.

predictors.name: Fare
predictors.description: A numeric variable indicating the passenger's fare.

predictors.name: Embarked
predictors.description: A categorical variable indicating the port of embarkation (C = Cherbourg, Q = Queenstown, S = Southampton).
